articles.title: Black Hole Unmasked: Astronomers Capture First Image of Accretion Ring and Relativistic Jet - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Scientists used new technology to produce an unprecedented image of both the accretion process and the jet of the Messier 87 black hole. Utilizing the GMVA, ALMA, and GLT, they've observed a larger ring-like structure and a broader radiation from the inner re…
articles.content:

articles.title: Stadium-sized asteroid approaching Earth at rapid pace! NASA reveals details - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA has revealed that an asteroid could be making its closest approach to Earth today, and it is huge! Check out its speed, distance, and other details, as revealed by NASA.
